page.title: 11Jobs and Population Survey
page.content: In June, we carried out a survey in Woodchurch to find out how the population had altered and the kinds of jobs that could be done in Woodchurch. Out of the 100 households interviewed - total of 124 people - 52 worked in Woodchurch, 49 left the village daily for employment and 23 were unemployed. We compared jobs and population in - {1845(pop.1280) 1985(pop.1666) Farmers Farmers Wheelwright Cooks Blacksmith Shopkeepers Shopkeepers Policeman Miller Milkman Lath render Gardeners Saddle and Harness Antique Dealer Taylor (Maker Teachers Boot and Shoe Maker Artist School Teacher Post Office Clerk Carpenter Transport Manager
